description:
Each week on Polygon, we round up the most notable new releases to streaming and VOD, highlighting the biggest and best new movies for you to watch at home.

This week, Flow, the Golden Globe-winning animated feature from director Gints Zilbalodis, washes ashore to purchase on VOD. There’s tons of other exciting releases on VOD this week too, like the apocalyptic musical The End starring Tilda Swinton and Michael Shannon, as well as two harrowing documentaries in the form of Soundtrack to a Coup d’Etat and Black Box Diaries. In terms of this week’s new streaming options, we’ve got a French action thriller on Net
title: Flow, Netflix’s Ad Vitam, Look Into My Eyes, and every movie new to streaming this week

description:
For at least the last decade, video games have been offering profound emotional single-player experiences, yet the recent surge of solo tabletop role-playing games has shown that pen & paper RPGs can be just as heartbreaking — if not more. 

Traditionally, tabletop role-playing games have been opportunities for players to come together at the table to crack jokes and slay monsters. While older hack and slash tablet
title: These solo tabletop RPGs will break your heart and put it back together

description:
Love and Deepspace, the mega-popular mobile game from the studios behind Infinity Nikki, will be getting a head-turning feature in its next update: a period tracker.

Released stateside in 2024 by InFold Games and Papergames, Love and Deepspace is a free-to-download otome game where players meet, date, and get to know a variety of swoon-worthy virtual men in a sci-fi setting. In a 3.0 update livestream on Friday, developers shared new updates heading to the game on Jan. 22, including one that would add a period-trac
title: Love and Deepspace introduces a new innovation in video games: a period tracker

description:
Fun’s over: The latest update to Marvel Rivals has killed support for PC mods that change the looks of its heroes, like turning Iron Man into Vegeta or Mantis into a goth.

Just after season 1 started on Friday, players started asking in the Marvel Rivals Discord why their mods weren’t working. It turns out the game now scans through its files to check if they’ve been altered through a feature called asset hash checking. Anything it does
title: Marvel Rivals mod support is dead

description:
System requirements for Civilization 7 have been announced ahead of its release by developer Firaxis Games, which also confirmed that Civilization 7 is Steam Deck verified.

Firaxis detailed minimum, recommended, and ultra setting requirements for PC, but only shared minimum and recommended for Mac and Linux. Luckily, even if you’re not rocking a top-of-the-line rig, you won’t need to heavily update your system! As for handheld enjoyers, your gameplay may be a little restricted depending on your device.

Here are t
title: Civilization 7 system requirements for Windows PC, Steam Deck, Mac, and Linux

description:
Since the release of The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim in 2011, the game has inspired one of the largest and most active modding communities in the history of video games. Countless enthusiasts have created mods ranging from quality-of-life changes that make the game easier to play, to detailed graphical and content additions that transform its fantasy world completely. Then, in December 2024, more than a decade after its release, a modder gave us the most important update to the game that we might ever get: rats.

That’s it. It’s just rats.

This mod f
title: The best way to make Skyrim more realistic? Rats

description:
Forecast towers allow you to see the upcoming Storm Circle before it spawns in Fortnite.

Learning the location of the next Storm Circle early is extremely helpful, as it allows you to position yourself in a prime position before other players can. To get the next Storm Circle early, you’ll need to find and use one of the two forecast towers that spawn each game, but it can be a little tricky: There are five different locations that they can spawn.

Here’s where each forecast tower is located in Fortnite<
title: All forecast tower locations in Fortnite

description:
The true test for how far a hero shooter is willing to go with its roster is how it handles its support role. Overwatch is proof that heroes like Mercy — and later Brigitte — can control the pace of a match and therefore the entire game, shattering metas and sparking new ones. Marvel Rivals season 1 continues to speedrun Overwatch’s history of balance with the release of the Invisible Woman, a hero that seems built to bend what it means to play support.

It would be hard not to with the bucket of a
title: Marvel Rivals is already breaking the idea of playing support with the Invisible Woman

description: Holy crowdfunding campaign, Batman! Two years after raising nearly $1.5 million for the Batman: Gotham City Chronicles role-playing game, the team at Monolith Board Games is crowdfunding an expanded Skyline Edition. For this campaign, Monolith Boar
title: This Gotham City RPG offers something for every type of Batman fan

description:
The Marvel Rivals season 1 battle pass, formally referred to as the Darkhold in-game, offers 10 new skins and a variety of other cosmetic goodies for both free-to-play players and those who pick up the paid “luxury” battle pass (or its upgrade). But is the Marvel Rivals season 1 battle pass worth its $10 price tag?

In this Marvel Rivals guide, we’ll walk you if the season 1 battle pass is worth it
title: Is the Marvel Rivals season 1 battle pass worth it?

description:
There are 10 skins in the Marvel Rivals season 1 battle pass, most of which fit into a spooky vampire theme. While two of these skins are available for free, the other eight require you to purchase the paid “luxury” battle pass.

Below, we’ll show you all skins in the Marvel Rivals season 1 battle pass, plus details about what else is in the battle pass and how many Chrono Tokens
title: All Marvel Rivals season 1 battle pass skins and rewards

description: At the 2025 Action Briefing event, Renegade Games announced updated titles to historical tabletop game line Axis & Allies. The franchise, which puts players in the roles of major military powers during the first and second World Wars, has four major releases coming out this year: a new theater of war, the return of an old classic, a deluxe battlemap, and a fantasy game in their Powered by Axis & Allies line.
title: Fight Nazis at Stalingrad in this upcoming Axis & Allies release

description:
Genki, a peripheral manufacturer that previously boasted about having access to Nintendo’s upcoming Switch successor, is now walking back the legitimacy of its own Switch 2 mock-ups, Automaton West reports.

During a Jan. 10 interview with J
title: Genki says it’s never seen the Switch 2, mock-ups were based on other leaks

description: The Skywalker saga is complete, the Clone Wars animated series has come to an end (sort of), and one of the best Star Wars stories ever told is between seasons. But one of Star Wars’ latest forays back to a galaxy far, far away actually takes plac
title: The best order to watch all the Star Wars movies and shows

description:
With Star Wars: Jedi Knights, Marvel Comics’ latest series set in that galaxy far, far away, writer Marc Guggenheim (Legends of Tomorrow, X-Men Gold) wants to do something different: Tell a story of the prequel-era Jedi like Qui-Gon Jinn, Yoda, and Mace Windu… without the prequel-era corruption and malaise that lead to their downfall.

“I love the idea that the Jedi are the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy,” Guggenheim told Polygon via email, “but there are surprisingly few examples of that out there — mainly because the Jedi get sucked into the Clone Wars. I’m as much of a fan of the Clone Wars as t
title: Five pages from Marvel’s new Star Wars series shows Jedi badassery at its height

description: If you want proof that Indiana Jones and the Great Circle would have been a serious Game of the Year contender at
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is a GOTY front-runner at the DICE Awards

description:
Pokémon Go’s yearly “Fashion Week” event for 2025 has started, running Jan. 10-19, and bringing back a bunch of costumed Pokémon. This event specifically introduces a costumed Minccino in cute glasses and ribbons.

“Fashion Week” 2025 also includes doubled Stardust from catching Pokémon and doubled chance to get Candy XL for trainers level 31 or higher. Some Pokémon also have an increased shiny chance when you see them. The costumed Kirlia will have an increased chance to be shiny when found in the wild, and
title: Pokémon Go ‘Fashion Week’ 2025 event guide

description: Some movie and TV stories, described to someone who hasn’t seen them, invariably sound cooler than they are. (Just try to sum up the plot of Disney Plus’ The Acolyte without sounding like you’re trying to sell it.) Others are just never going to sound like good ideas, no matter how well they’re executed. Scott Mann’s 2022 horror-thriller Fall, newly arrived on Hulu, is one of the latter — there’s j
title: The dizzying thriller Fall does for heights what The Descent did for depths

description:
Recursive Destruction allows you to restore terrain and objects to their original form in Marvel Rivals.

Recursive Destruction is a new feature that is unique to the Midtown map, and you must trigger it to complete a mission from the Midnight Features seasonal event. As it’s a new and unique feature, it can be quite confusing trying to figure out
title: How to trigger Recursive Destruction in Marvel Rivals

description:
As multiple wildfires rage around the Los Angeles area, the Final Fantasy 14 team has decided to delay the game’s automatic housing demolition on North American servers so that players affected by the disaster, and therefore unable to log into the game, won’t lose their digital homes.

The auto-demolition counter was suspended for the Aether, Crystal, Dynamis, and Primal data centers on Jan. 9 at 8:20 p.m. PT, and the devs plan to monitor the situation in Southern California for the foreseeable
title: Final Fantasy 14 housing demolition delayed on NA servers due to Los Angeles wildfires

description: With its season 1 finale, Creature Commandos has secured its spot for the strangest first installment of an interconnected cinematic superhero universe. And James Gunn’s Max animated series also nailed a satisfying conclusion. “A Very Funny Monster” is twisty and tense, earns its emotional beats, sets up for a new season in the burgeoning DCU, and doesn’t even end in a big loud blowout.
title: Creature Commandos is the better version of The Suicide Squad

description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, a United States government agency charged with protecting consumers from unfair and deceptive practices from banks and financial institutions, proposed a
title: The US government wants to start protecting you from Robux scams

description:
Following the debut of the Steam Deck OLED in late 2023, the $399 Steam Deck now comes with 256 GB of internal storage. That’s a lot more than the 64 GB it used to come with at that introductory price point, but it still may not be enough storage for your gaming needs. Thankfully, upgrading the Deck’s storage is both easy and relatively affordable.

Like the Nintendo Switch and other handhelds, every Steam Deck supports microSD cards as an option for storage expansion, and
title: Here are the best microSD cards for Steam Deck

description: The PS5 is home to gaming experiences you can’t find on any other console. While popular PS
title: The best PS5 accessories

description: After a brutal year for the video game industry, 2025 is looking brighter and much busier — if only because Rockstar Games plans to release Grand Theft Auto 6
title: All the new video games launching in 2025

description:
CES 2025 saw the unveiling of some exciting gaming gear, like the new Lenovo Legion Go S, the Nvidia RTX 5090, and some tech that’s made to make life a bit easier. Anker’s new 140 W multi-port wall charger definitely falls into the latter bucket, but I’m still oddly excited about it, especially because it’s already $10 off its $89.99 price at Amazon.

While Anker makes countless wall
title: Anker’s clever new USB-C charger is $10 off

description:
The Midnight Features event arrives in Marvel Rivals with the launch of Season 1.

The Midnight Features event consists of five investigations, with the first investigation being available at launch and the rest on their way as the event progresses. You can earn currency and sprays from completing missions, and get bigger prizes like gallery cards and costumes from completing investigations.

Here’s all Marvel Rivals Midnight Features event missions and rewards.
title: Marvel Rivals Midnight Features event missions and rewards so far

description: If the 2024 Game of the Year race was defined by a relatively open field with no clear frontrunner, then 2025 could not be more different — or so it seems at first glance. Grand Theft Auto 6, scheduled for release in late 2025, is the juggernaut to beat and will remain
title: Can anything beat GTA 6 for Game of the Year 2025?

description:
As a longtime tabletop role-player, watching Dimension 20’s Dungeons and Drag Queens is the same experience as introducing a friend to a favorite television show you know they’ll dig. All the joy of watching your beloved show, and the joy of watching someone else learn to love it as well. 

The actual play setting, helmed by game master Brennan Lee Mulligan with players and RuPaul’s Dra
title: Brennan Lee Mulligan and the Questing Queens are grappling with consequences

description: When the small Palworld team, based in Japan, hit the green light on the game on Jan. 19, 2024 — successfully pushing the game public into early access — developers gathered around the office vending machine to celebrate. Immediately, players started to flood in. It was an instant success. The g
title: Palworld global community manager on its meteoric launch: ‘We definitely panicked’
